title: Eidolon
data:

| eidolon W [![Eidolon.png](/images/1/1d/Eidolon.png)](/File:Eidolon.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                          | 47-96                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |

| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                          | 140                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| Attack1                                                                 | 27 ([hit](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [drain speed](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                                                                             |

| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                 | [rC+](/Cold "Cold") [rPois+++](/Poison "Poison") [rDrown](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation") [rMiasma](/Miasma "Miasma") [rN+++](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") [rTorm](/Torment "Torment") [rSticky](/Sticky_Flame "Sticky Flame") |

|   |                                                                                                                 |
| - | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | An ancient skeletal apparition, sheathed in a cloud of mist. Its form glows white-hot with debilitating energy. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Eidola** are insubstantial [undead](/Undead "Undead"), a type of [wraith](/Wraith "Wraith"). Their melee attacks [slow](/Slow "Slow") and cause [stat drain](/Stat_drain "Stat drain"), and they can fire damaging bolts at range. They can be found in and around [the Crypt](/The_Crypt "The Crypt"), [the Abyss](/The_Abyss "The Abyss"), and [Tartarus](/Tartarus "Tartarus").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                 |                                                      |
| :---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Bolt of Draining](/Bolt_of_Draining "Bolt of Draining") (3d21) | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Cause Fear](/Cause_Fear "Cause Fear")                          | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Pile on the [negative energy resistance](/Negative_energy_resistance "Negative energy resistance") when dealing with these guys, as [Cause Fear](/Cause_Fear "Cause Fear") coupled with [Bolt of Draining](/Bolt_of_Draining "Bolt of Draining") can result in heavy amounts of [draining](/Draining "Draining") very quickly.
- Cause Fear can be resisted with high [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower"). This can be critical if you lack the means to defeat them quickly at range.
- [Silence](/Silence "Silence") doesn't stop these guys from casting, so don't expect that [silent spectre](/Silent_spectre "Silent spectre") you have following you around to provide any assistance.

## History

- Prior to [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), eidola would drain your experience with their melee attacks. This change accompanied the 0.13 overhaul to draining effects. They also gained [Bolt of Draining](/Bolt_of_Draining "Bolt of Draining").
html:
Eidolon

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.26: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
eidolon W 
HP 47-96
HD 13
XP 1139
Speed 10
AC 12
EV 10
Will 140
Attack1 27 (hit: drain speed)
Attack2 17 (hit: drain stat)


Resistances rC+
rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
rSticky
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Open doors
Holiness Undead
Size Medium
Type wraith, eidolon
Flags Evil
See invisible
Flying
Unbreathing
Insubstantial
An ancient skeletal apparition, sheathed in a cloud of mist. Its form glows white-hot with debilitating energy.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Eidola are insubstantial undead, a type of wraith. Their melee attacks slow and cause stat drain, and they can fire damaging bolts at range. They can be found in and around the Crypt, the Abyss, and Tartarus.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Bolt of Draining (3d21) Magical flag
Slot2 Cause Fear Magical flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Pile on the negative energy resistance when dealing with these guys, as Cause Fear coupled with Bolt of Draining can result in heavy amounts of draining very quickly.
  • Cause Fear can be resisted with high willpower. This can be critical if you lack the means to defeat them quickly at range.
  • Silence doesn't stop these guys from casting, so don't expect that silent spectre you have following you around to provide any assistance.

History

  • Prior to 0.13, eidola would drain your experience with their melee attacks. This change accompanied the 0.13 overhaul to draining effects. They also gained Bolt of Draining.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Eidolon&oldid=73973"

rawPage:
{{version026}}
{{monster info}}
==Useful Info==
'''Eidola''' are insubstantial [[undead]], a type of [[wraith]]. Their melee attacks [[slow]] and cause [[stat drain]], and they can fire damaging bolts at range. They can be found in and around [[the Crypt]], [[the Abyss]], and [[Tartarus]].

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Pile on the [[negative energy resistance]] when dealing with these guys, as [[Cause Fear]] coupled with [[Bolt of Draining]] can result in heavy amounts of [[draining]] very quickly.
*Cause Fear can be resisted with high [[willpower]]. This can be critical if you lack the means to defeat them quickly at range.
*[[Silence]] doesn't stop these guys from casting, so don't expect that [[silent spectre]] you have following you around to provide any assistance.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.13]], eidola would drain your experience with their melee attacks. This change accompanied the 0.13 overhaul to draining effects. They also gained [[Bolt of Draining]].
